**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 129 1.1 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- The tip of a metallic dragon's claw is set into a band of silver. When you summon dragons using the claw, you must choose [metallic dragons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=35).
  • **Armor** After you cast a [conjuration](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=86) spell by activating the _wyrm claw_, you gain resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, and fire for the next minute.
  • **Weapon** After you cast a conjuration spell by activating the claw, you gain a Breath Weapon activity that takes 2 actions and deals 6d6 damage with a DC 28 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save. Choose the area and type of damage when you use Breath Weapon: a 30-foot line that deals acid, electricity, or fire, or a 15-foot cone that deals cold or fire. You can use this activity once before the end of your next turn.
Wyrm Claw **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 129 1.1 **Price** 1,000 gp --- Wyrm Claw (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 129 1.1 **Price** 6,500 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 10, and damage from Breath Weapon when affixed to a weapon is 9d6 (DC 34). Wyrm Claw (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 129 1.1 **Price** 40,000 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 15, and damage from Breath Weapon when affixed to a weapon is 12d6 (DC 41).
